changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE users( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY , username VARCHAR, email VARCHAR, password VARCHAR, phone_number VARCHAR, status BOOLEAN, basket_id BIGINT, created_date TIMESTAMP, last_modified_date TIMESTAMP, created_by VARCHAR, last_modified_by VARCHAR );

CREATE TABLE user_orders( user_id BIGINT REFERENCES user(id), order_id BIGINT REFERENCES order(id), created_date TIMESTAMP, last_modified_date TIMESTAMP, created_by VARCHAR, last_modified_by VARCHAR );

CREATE TABLE user_addresses ( user_id BIGINT REFERENCES user (id), address_id BIGINT REFERENCES address (id), created_date TIMESTAMP, last_modified_date TIMESTAMP, created_by VARCHAR, last_modified_by VARCHAR );
